name: Melon Splatman
description:
Avoid the rising melon tide by bouncing on exploding melons that shoot out melon seeds. Collect as many golden melon slices as you can! Lemme know your high score in the comments.

Spacebar to jump. Mouse movement controls the camera. 

Fullscreen available in standalone Windows build.

Developed by Dan Schumacher in 48 hours using Kenney assets for Kenney Jam 2022.
